```
#!/bin/bash
for i in {1..46}
do
  VARX=`printf '%04x\n' $i`
  echo "Reading handle: $VARX"
  gatttool -b a4:cf:12:6c:b3:76 --char-read -a 0x$VARX
  sleep 5
done
```
